title: Bannou Skill No Rettou Seijo Kiyosugiru No De Binbou Ni Wa Narimasendeshita
alternative_title: The Incompetent Saint with All-Purpose Skills: Too Handy to Ever Be Poor~ ; Banno Skill no Retto Seijo Kiyosugiru node Bimbo ni ha ; 万能スキルの劣等聖女 ～器用すぎるので貧乏にはなりませんでした～ ; La Santa Inferior de Habilidades Versátiles: ¡Era tan Hábil que no Pudo Escapar de la Pobreza!
status: The Incompetent Saint with All-Purpose Skills: Too Handy to Ever Be Poor~ ; Banno Skill no Retto Seijo Kiyosugiru node Bimbo ni ha ; 万能スキルの劣等聖女 ～器用すぎるので貧乏にはなりませんでした～ ; La Santa Inferior de Habilidades Versátiles: ¡Era tan Hábil que no Pudo Escapar de la Pobreza!
description:
Description :
        "So, you're an inferior saint, huh!"                                                                Soara, who received the divine revelation of a saint, was invited to the party of her childhood friend, the hero Zeno. Everyone in the party had S-rank skills and high expectations of her, but she was banished for not having any outstanding talent.  Although shocked, Soara did not lose heart and transitioned into a freelance adventurer. She deepened her bonds with the companions she met during her travels, gradually recovering from the shock of being expelled from the party and achieving success along the way—but—?
